summary: Email chain between FBI Victim Services Division and a law firm regarding arrangements for a confidential victim to attend an FBI briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. The communication focuses on RSVP logistics, security requirements, and protecting the victim's identity.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are the subject of the FBI briefing. He is the central figure of the case.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miramar
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein, held at the Miami Field Office in Miramar, Florida.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein, held at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was organizing confidential briefings for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
A law firm was representing a victim whose name had never been publicly released, and strict confidentiality was requested to protect her identity.
The briefings required detailed security information (including Social Security Number and citizenship) for entry into the federal buildings.
The email chain demonstrates the FBI's post-arrest outreach and coordination with victims' legal representatives.
